title: [Ta'Illistim, Glamesine Var]
description: The var comes to an end in a pleasant little cul-de-sac, framed on three sides by blue-grey marble buildings.  Several elves are taking advantage of the polished marble benches resting in the shelter of two dwarf maoral trees.  In an open window high above the var, a pale golden light illuminates some blue and silver curtains that flutter in the gentle night breeze.

The var comes to an end in a pleasant little cul-de-sac, framed on three sides by blue-grey marble buildings.  Several elves are taking advantage of the polished marble benches resting in the shadow of two dwarf maoral trees.  In an open window high above the var, some blue and silver curtains flutter in the gentle breeze.

The var comes to an end in a little cul-de-sac, framed on three sides by white marble buildings, including the Ta'Illistim Royal Arboretum.  A dwarf maoral tree sits near the Arboretum's doorway, hung with a silver lantern and shading a low bench.

The var comes to an end in a little cul-de-sac, framed on three sides by white marble buildings, including the Ta'Illistim Royal Arboretum.  A dwarf maoral tree sits near the Arboretum's doorway, shading a low bench.
